statements.select: select a.I_INTID, a.C_MATERIELCODE, a.C_MATERIELNAME, a.N_LIMITWGT, a.I_LIMITSTATUS, to_char(to_date(a.C_CREATETIME,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') as C_CREATETIME, a.C_CREATEUSERNAME, to_char(to_date(a.C_UPDATETIME,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') as C_UPDATETIME, a.C_UPDATEUSERNAME from SM_MatWGTLimit a left join SM_MATERIEL_LEVEL t ON t.C_MATERIELCODE=a.C_MATERIELCODE where I_LIMITSTATUS=1 order by C_UPDATETIME desc

select a.I_INTID, a.C_MATERIELCODE, a.C_MATERIELNAME, a.N_LIMITWGT, a.I_LIMITSTATUS, to_char(to_date(a.C_CREATETIME,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') as C_CREATETIME, a.C_CREATEUSERNAME, to_char(to_date(a.C_UPDATETIME,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') as C_UPDATETIME, a.C_UPDATEUSERNAME from SM_MatWGTLimit a left join SM_MATERIEL_LEVEL t ON t.C_MATERIELCODE=a.C_MATERIELCODE where I_LIMITSTATUS=1 and a.C_MATERIELNAME=#value#

statements.insert:
select SEQ_SM_MatWGTLimit.nextval as IntId from dual
insert into SM_MatWGTLimit ( I_INTID, C_MATERIELCODE, C_MATERIELNAME, N_LIMITWGT, I_LIMITSTATUS, C_CREATETIME, C_CREATEUSERNAME, C_UPDATETIME, C_UPDATEUSERNAME )values ( #IntId#, #Materielcode#, #Materielname#, #Limitwgt#, #Limitstatus#, to_char(sysdate,'yyyyMMddhh24miss'), #Createusername#, to_char(sysdate,'yyyyMMddhh24miss'), #Updateusername# )
statements.update: update SM_MatWGTLimit set C_MATERIELCODE=#Materielcode#, C_MATERIELNAME=#Materielname#, N_LIMITWGT=#Limitwgt#, I_LIMITSTATUS=#Limitstatus#, C_UPDATETIME=to_char(sysdate,'yyyyMMddhh24miss'), C_UPDATEUSERNAME=#Updateusername# where I_IntId = #IntId#
